3DPC_SurfacePlot Properties

Requires: Full Development System

Property Description
Axes:Active Axis Property Sets the axis you want to configure. Details
Axes:Caption Color Property Sets the color of the axis caption. Details
Axes:Caption Font Size Sets the font size of the caption for the axis. Details
Axes:Caption Opposite Visible Displays the axis caption on the opposite side of the axis that the Axes:Caption Visible property displays the caption. Details
Axes:Caption Text Configures the text of the axis caption to display on the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Caption Visible Displays the axis caption in the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Grid Color Sets the color of the axis grid on the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Grid Visible Displays the axis grid in the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Label Color Sets the color of the axis label. Details
Axes:Label Font Size Specifies the font size of the label for the axes on the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Label Opposite Visible Displays the axis label on the opposite side of the grid that the Axes:Label Visible property displays the label. Details
Axes:Label Visible Displays the axis label in the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Major Tick Count Specifies the number of major tick marks that appear on the axis. Major Tick Count also determines the number of grid lines and value labels. Details
Axes:Major Tick Visible Displays the major tick marks on the axis in the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Minor Tick Count Specifies the number of minor tick marks on the axis. Details
Axes:Minor Tick Visible Sets the visibility of minor tick marks on the axis. Details
Axes:Range Autoscale Adjusts the scale automatically to reflect the data you wire to the 3D graph. Details
Axes:Range Maximum Sets the maximum value of the scale. Details
Axes:Range Minimum Sets the minimum value of the scale. Details
Axes:Tick Color Sets the color of the tick marks on the axis. Details
Cursors:Active Cursor Sets the cursor you want to configure. Details
Cursors:Cursor Column Sets the style of the cursor column. Details
Cursors:Cursor Enable Enables you to move the cursor you configure around the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Font Size Specifies the font size of the cursor name and values on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Line Color Sets the color of the cursor line. Details
Cursors:Cursor Line Visible Displays the cursor line on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Line Width Specifies the width of the cursor line on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor List Specifies the cursor list that allows the user to manually edit the cursor data. Details
Cursors:Cursor Lock Style Sets the style of the cursor lock. Details
Cursors:Cursor Plane Color Sets the color of the cursor plane on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Plane Opacity Specifies the level of opacity of the color you apply to the cursor plane. Opacity ranges from 0 to 1 where 1 is completely opaque. Details
Cursors:Cursor Plane XY Displays the X�Y cursor plane on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Plane XZ Displays the X�Z cursor plane on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Plane YZ Displays the Y�Z cursor plane on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Plot Sets the plot you want to configure. Details
Cursors:Cursor Point Color Sets the color of the cursor point on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Point Size Specifies the size of the point on the cursor. Details
Cursors:Cursor Point Visible Displays the cursor point on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Row Sets the visibility of the cursor row. Details
Cursors:Cursor Show Name Displays the cursor name on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Show Position Displays the cursor position on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Text Background Color Specifies the color of the cursor text background on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Text Color Specifies the color of the cursor text on the 3D graph. Details
Cursors:Cursor Text Opacity Specifies the level of opacity of the color you apply to the cursor text. Opacity ranges from 0 to 1 where 1 is completely opaque. Details
Cursors:Cursor Visible Displays the cursor in the 3D scene. Details
Cursors:Cursor X Position Displays the position of the cursor on the x-axis. Details
Cursors:Cursor Y Position Displays the position of the cursor on the y-axis. Details
Cursors:Cursor Z Position Displays the position of the cursor on the z-axis. Details
Format:X Axis Format String Sets the formatting for the x-axis. Details
Format:Y Axis Format String Sets the formatting for the y-axis. Details
Format:Z Axis Format String Sets the formatting for the z-axis. Details
Graph:Background Color Specifies the background color of the plot. Details
Graph:Disable Updates Disables updates to the 3D graph. If you do not want the 3D graph to render for each property you write, use this property to disable updates to the 3D graph. Details
Graph:Fast Draw Speeds up the pan, zoom, and rotate operations on the 3D graph. LabVIEW removes geometries when performing pan, zoom, or rotate to speed up the rotate operations. Details
Graph:Lighting Enables all lighting effects in the 3D scene. Details
Graph:Projection Mode Changes the projection of the 3D graph. Details
Graph:View Direction Sets the direction to view the 3D graph. Details
Graph:X-Y Grid Visible View the 3D graph in the direction of the X�Y plane. Details
Graph:X-Z Grid Visible View the 3D graph in the direction of the X�Z plane. Details
Graph:Y-Z Grid Visible View the 3D graph in the direction of the Y�Z plane. Details
Lights:Light Array Sets the coordinates of the lights on the 3D graph. Details
Lights:Brightness Sets the level of brightness of the lights in the 3D scene. Details
Lights:Focus Sets the level of focus of the lights in the 3D scene. Details
Lights:Linear Attenuation Indicates the linear factor of attenuation (kl) you apply to the light. The linear factor of attenuation drops in a linear manner as distance from the light increases. Details
Lights:Quadratic Attenuation Indicates the quadratic factor of attenuation (kq) you apply to the light. The quadratic factor of attenuation drops by the square of the distance from the light. Details
Plots:Active Plot Gets or sets the active plot. Details
Plots:Contour Anchored Anchors the 3D graph plot. Details
Plots:Contour Anchor Point Anchors the 3D graph plot to a specific point. Details
Plots:Contour Antialiasing Specifies whether the contour is anti-aliased to smooth lines and edges that appear jagged. Details
Plots:Contour Axis Determines the axis of the contour. Details
Plots:Contour Color Sets the color of the 3D graph contour. Details
Plots:Contour Draw Enables or disables the contour on the 3D graph. Details
Plots:Contour Interval Sets the amount of space between each contour line. Details
Plots:Contour Level List Sets the value of each contour line. Details
Plots:Contour Levels Sets the number of contour lines. Details
Plots:Contour Line Style Line style of the contour on the 3D graph. Details
Plots:Contour Mode Specifies the mode of the 3D graph contour. Details
Plots:Contour Width Specifies the width of the contour on the 3D graph object. Details
Plots:Coordinate System Configures the coordinate system of the 3D graph surface. Details
Plots:Draw XY Projection Displays the X�Y plane on the 3D graph. Details
Plots:Draw XZ Projection Displays the X�Z plane on the 3D graph. Details
Plots:Draw YZ Projection Displays the Y�Z plane on the 3D graph. Details
Plots:Normal Antialiasing Specifies whether the normal is anti-aliased to smooth lines and edges that appear jagged. Details
Plots:Normal Color Sets the color of the 3D graph normal. Details
Plots:Normal Draw Draws the normals of the 3D graph. Details
Plots:Normal Length Specifies the length of the normal. Details
Plots:Normal Width Specifies the width of the normal. Details
Plots:Surface Color Map Sets the color of the 3D graph surface. Details
Plots:Surface Draw Draws the 3D graph surface. Details
Plots:Surface Opacity Specifies the level of opacity of the color you apply to the 3D graph surface. Opacity ranges from 0 to 1 where 1 is completely opaque. Details
Plots:Surface Shading Applies shading to the 3D graph surface. Details
Plots:Surface Shininess Applies shine to the 3D graph surface. Details
Value Pairs:X Value Pairs Data Array Lists the index, name, and value of the value pairs you want to display on the 3D graph. Details
Value Pairs:X Value Pairs Labels Specifies how value pairs appear on the 3D graph. Details
Value Pairs:X Value Pairs Show Grid Lines Displays grid lines for each value pair. The grid line appears on the graph at the corresponding value. Details
Value Pairs:X Value Pairs Show Ticks Displays tick marks on the 3D graph for the value pairs you configure. Details
Value Pairs:Y Value Pairs Data Array Lists the index, name, and value of the value pairs you want to display on the 3D graph. Details
Value Pairs:Y Value Pairs Labels Specifies how value pairs appear on the 3D graph. Details
Value Pairs:Y Value Pairs Show Grid Lines Displays grid lines for each value pair. The grid line appears on the graph at the corresponding value. Details
Value Pairs:Y Value Pairs Show Ticks Displays tick marks on the 3D graph for the value pairs you configure. Details
Value Pairs:Z Value Pairs Data Array Lists the index, name, and value of the value pairs you want to display on the 3D graph. Details
Value Pairs:Z Value Pairs Labels Specifies how value pairs appear on the 3D graph. Details
Value Pairs:Z Value Pairs Show Grid Lines Displays grid lines for each value pair. The grid line appears on the graph at the corresponding value. Details
Value Pairs:Z Value Pairs Show Ticks Displays tick marks on the 3D graph for the value pairs you configure. Details
Plots:Overlay Displays the overlay on the plot. Details
Plots:Overlay Antialiasing Specifies whether the overlay is anti-aliased to smooth lines and edges that appear jagged. Details
Plots:Overlay Color Sets the color of the 3D graph overlay. Details
Plots:Overlay Line Style Sets the line style for the lines on the plot overlay. Details
Plots:Overlay Line Width Specifies the width of the plots lines on the 3D graph. Details
Plots:Overlay Point Size Specifies the size and width of the 3D graph point. Details
Plots:Overlay Point Style Sets the point style for the points on the plot overlay. Details
